Usage: cli-test.js [cmd1] [anotherCmd] [options] [flags]
Commands:
	[cmd1] - main route for the program
		test1 - The first command option
		test2 - The second command option
	[anotherCmd] - Secondary command, changes the output of the thing
		t1 - To test the first bit
		t2 - To test the second bit

Options:
	-o,--opt - Just a test opt

Flags:
	-t,--test1 - Just a test flag
	-u,--test2 - Another test flag
